Remote Learning Plan Approved by VBISD
Bangor Public School District Continuity of Learning Plan
District Guidance Remote Learning is processed in four phases: Phase 1-Preparing for Remote Learning, Phase 2-Supplemental Learning, Phase 3-New Learning (Essential Standards), and Phase 4-Return.
